transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good evening sir, aap brand ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Manisha baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se, kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Theek hoon.
Executive: Achcha maine thoda service ke liye call kiya tha sir, abhi kaisa chal raha hai response kaisa aa raha hai IndiaMART se?
Customer: Maine pehle bhi bataya tha abhi bhi bata raha hoon bilkul ghatiya hai bilkul koi matlab nahi hai payment ke paise lag gaye forward ka.
Executive: Aap check kar rahe hain?
Customer: percent bhi service nahi hai. Na koi service hai na koi kuch hai jab package nahi lete the to jabardasti bol bol ke jabardasti phone kar karke package dilwa diya package aaya to uske baad me koi ek single order nahi aaya isme.
Executive: Aapne jitne customers se baat kari hai sir unse kuch bhi response nahi nikla?
Customer: Ek to catalog bhi change nahi kar rahe ho main aapko 10 baar bol diya hoon catalog change karo mera photo vagera sab change karo.
Executive: Catalog me changes karwane hai aapko?
Customer: Profile ha sab kuch karna tha change karna tha kuch aap kar hi nahi rahe.
Executive: Sir aapne bataya hi nahi matlab isse pehle to aapne ek baar bhi nahi bola catalog me changes karane hai aap bataiye kaun se products update karane hai. Main keh rahi hoon isse pehle aapne bola nahi na sir catalog me product vagera change karwana hai aapko. Tumhara help help help karne wale to nahi hai na help karenge tab na.
Executive: To aap bataiye na sir aapko kya help chahiye ya kya kaam karwana hai aapko catalog pe aap main aap mujhe bata dijiye main kar deti hoon.
Customer: Ek to profile photo change karo mera theek hai na uske baad me order vagera jo aa rahe hain direct number pe ya whatsapp pe call hona chahiye mere ko ya whatsapp pe aana chahiye koi customer inquiry karta hai to direct whatsapp pe connect hona chahiye.
Executive: Ye aapko jisne aapko sell kiya tha jo aapke paas aaye the unhone aapko bola tha ki sir whatsapp bhi directly aayega aapke paas?
Customer: Haan bola tha bilkul whatsapp pe direct connect ho jayenge abhi main ek hi pehle market place pe kaam karta hoon to direct connect ho jayega whatsapp pe whatsapp number dalne pe direct connect ho jata hai isme itni badi company hai payment bhi le rahi hai sab kuch le rahi hai uske baad me bhi nahi hota kya hai fir agent ye.
Executive: Sir aapke phone me option aata hai isme unko whatsapp karne ka aap agar phone me dekhiye na.
Customer: Customer ka connect ka matlab hai customer direct connect hona chahiye mere se direct whatsapp ke zariye ya call ke zariye direct connect hona chahiye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye.
Customer: Main agar itni mehnat karunga tab to ho gaya kalyan mera mehnat karne ka matlab payment lene ka kya matlab hai direct connect hona chahiye customer se bhai aa ye ye hai bhai banda ye hai bhai ye hai isse hai. Hi is this available price ye sab kuch likha hua aana chahiye direct jaise usme aata tha na market place pe facebook pe social media pe wo free me de rahe hain bechare aur aap paise le rahe ho to bhi nahi ho raha hai batao.
Executive: Sir aap agar IndiaMART ka application use karenge na to waha par hum log aapko option dete hain sir IndiaMART se ki aap apna business.
Customer: Nahi nahi direct agla banda jab first time jo connect karta hai meri profile dekhta hai usko direct hai na usko milna chahiye whatsapp ka option milna chahiye usko. Whatsapp pe connect ho jaye taki uska agar main agar usko dikhu ya nahi dikhu baad me whatsapp pe hai na contact kar sakta hoon main usko baad me.
Executive: Hum log na aapka real number nahi dikhate hain main bata deti hoon kyun kyunki aisa hota hai na jaise agar humne aapka real number dikha diya catalog pe theek hai to uska misuse bhi hota hai to hum log aapko ek virtual number dete hain jo har company ko diya jata hai jitni bhi companies hamare sath registered hai. Theek hai jab client us pe call karta hai to wo aapke phone pe aata hai jab client aapko inquiry bhejta hai to wo aapke lead manager me aata hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Isme maine bhi aapki.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isme maine saat inquiry aayi hai sir in saat logo se kya baat hui aapki?
Customer: Ab main to nahi samajh sakta.
Executive: Nahi sir October me aapke paas saat.
Customer: Aise nahi hota hai main. Itna time kaise nikalenge.
Executive: Lekin inquiries to achchi aa rahi hai sir saat inquiry aayi hai aapke paas.
Customer: Ye to meri baat suno ye profile hai na change karo pehle ye meri. Iska paisa mil sakta hai kya mere ko wapis paisa mil sakta hai kya iska?
Executive: Profile me aapko kya kya change karwana hai bataiye. Main keh raha hoon iska jo mera package ka paisa mil sakta hai kya mere ko ye batao.
Executive: Sir refund ki to koi policy nahi hai.
Customer: Hai na wahi main keh raha hoon. Aap aapko kisi ne bola tha kya ki aapka refund ho jayega?
Customer: Haan wo matlab maine suna tha ki bhai aise aise baat agar koi agar IndiaMART pe response nahi aata na to wapis paise le sakte ho aur response to kuch aaya nahi usme.
Executive: Sir aapke paas na IndiaMART se customer aa pa raha hai theek hai ya to aisa ho pa raha hai ki hum log check nahi kar pa rahe hain. Customer time pass wale hai aise time pass karne wale hai customer genuine koi customer nahi hai mam. Genuine customer de nahi pa rahe ho na aap ye sab time pass wale hai koi matlab nahi hai inka.
Executive: Sir kal bhi aapke paas call aayi thi to usme customers se kuch deal. Call aayi to whatsapp bhi ho jana chahiye yahi main keh raha hoon jaise call koi karta hai to wo direct whatsapp number mera show hona chahiye whatsapp pe aana chahiye.
Executive: Sir hum aapko option dete hi hain whatsapp ka aap aap ek kaam kariye sir phone pe main aapko nahi samjha paungi aap ek baar online aa jaiye main aapko dobara se application chalana sikha dungi. Pehle meri ye hai ki dekho meri baat suno ye hai na profile change karo profile hai na picture hai na.
Executive: Aap mujhe bhejo to profile picture me kya lagana hai. Na hai na na meri hai na ye mail id change hui hai abhi tak.
Executive: Aap mujhe mail id change karani hai aapko?
Customer: Mere ko profile picture bhi change karani hai profile picture change karo pehle. Aap pehle mujhe picture to bhejo sir kya logo lagana hai main logo change kar aapko apni company ka logo lagana hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe bhejo to maine aapko whatsapp kiya hai aap mujhe logo bhejo main wo laga ke screenshot bhejti hoon aapko. Ye dekho meri baat suno ye hai na. Ye dekho logo bheja maine aapko ek minute jo ye logo bheja ye logo change karo mera.
Executive: Aap mujhe batao kya lagana hai main change kar deti hoon koi photo to bhejo jo lagani ho. Ek minute bhej raha hoon jo. Haan main bhejo bhejo main karati hoon.
Customer: Haan bhai. Chalo bhai set.
Customer: Ye to in logo me dekh lo agar ye logo agar success ho jaye to ye ye dekh lo nahi to aur bhej deta hoon.
Executive: Aaya nahi hai abhi. Haan theek hai. Ye falak online bazar ye wala delete kar do?
Customer: Haan ye ho jayega na. Haan koi sa bhi ho jayega jo aap bologe wo ho jayega.
Customer: Ye kar do na falak enterprise LED TV king. Theek hai ye wala kar dete hain sir. Hai na? Aur ye background me logo aata hai ki nahi?
Executive: Achcha matlab ek hi ek hi logo laga sakte hain na ya aur kuch laga sakte hain char panch. Nahi nahi nahi nahi ek hi laga sakte hain sir. Haan ek laga do ye laga do.
Customer: Ab aap check karo sir waha par aa gaya hoga aapke paas.
Customer: Abhi tak kuch nahi aaya. Abhi to wahi aa raha hai. Usme to wahi bata raha hai mam abhi tak. Ab check ek second aap check karo main aapko screenshot bhejti hoon maine aapke catalog pe dal diya is wale link se bhi check kar sakte ho aur main aapko screenshot bhi bhej deti hoon. Ye lead manager me lead manager me nikalna kya hai purpose vagera karne ya store vagera aa rahi hai.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Lead manager se nikalegi ki ye lead kaise nikalegi?
Executive: Lead manager me inquiry ki detail aati hai aur aapke paas buylead ki detail aati hai call ki detail bhi aati hai sir.
Executive: Logo aap check kar lo maine whatsapp pe bhej diya hai aapko.
Customer: To wo laga waha pe laga kone me hai na. Haan waha par aapki company naam ke samne laga hua hai sir.
Customer: Wo to lag gaya hai. Chalo wo to koi dikkat nahi ab meri baat suno koi update karna aur koi vagera product update karna hai electronic me vagera me to wo bhejo aapko main. Haan wo aap mujhe bhej do main kar kar deti hoon sir. Haan aur dusra sir aap thoda sa time nikalo theek hai 10 se 15 minute ka aap video meet pe aa jao kyunki bahut sari cheeze na abhi aap check nahi kar pa rahe ho IndiaMART ki main aapko wo bata deti hoon kaise check karna hai uske baad aap service use karna sir customer aa raha hai aapke paas. Aur suno ka ye dekho ye ketli vagera hai na ek minute ye add karne hai. Kitne kitne ke bhejunga main aapko dekho ye ye 3600 ka apne ko hai. Achcha ye sab ha ye sab na aap mujhe bhej rahe ho na iska price bhej do ha jaise abhi aapne 3600 bheja hai na ye price vagera bhej do ye main add kar deti hoon.
Customer: Ye hai. Haan.
Customer: Ye 13 liter hai hai na. Theek hai. Bas itna hi aur ye aapka number to dal do main is pe karunga kabhi to aap hi karna hai contact mere ko. Haan mere is wale number pe call kar lo ya jis pe main whatsapp kar rahi hoon us pe call kar lo mere se hi baat hogi mujhe hi call kar lena sir. Theek hai abhi ek baar update kar do ye hai na vagera aa rahi hai. Haan main ye update kar deti hoon. karo mam thoda aas paas ki lead jyada aani chahiye mere ko ab Hyderabad ki udhar ki aati hai koi matlab nahi hai mere se. Theek hai main wo kaam karti hoon sir pehle main ye add kar deti hoon aur main fir aapko call karti hoon dobara. Isme marble ke product bhi add ho jayenge kya? Ho jayenge sir. Theek hai ek baar ye karo fir dekhte hain baad me. Ha theek hai main ye wala karke aapko update karti hoon sir.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART services, no orders received.\n
- Wants catalog and profile picture to be changed.\n
- Wants direct WhatsApp connection with customers.\n
- Wants refund for the package.\n
- Inquiries are not genuine customers.\n
\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive explained the virtual number system.\n
- Agreed to change the profile picture.\n
- Agreed to add new products to the catalog.\n
- Executive offered a video meet to explain IndiaMART features.\n
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Customer to send the profile picture and product details.\n
- Executive will update the catalog and call back.\n
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
refund\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Satisfied\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- buyleads, profile update, refund, catalog, whatsapp
\n
